evaluation.questionText: Select the component that is NOT part of the Job Analysis and Assessment Strategy step:
evaluation.instructionText: Choose the best answer, then select Submit.

feedback.feedbackText: The Job Analysis and Assessment Strategy step involves identifying the critical competencies of the position; identifying knowledge, skills, and abilities; identifying factors in ranking applicants; and determining and confirming an assessment strategy.

The Job Analysis and Assessment Strategy step involves identifying the critical competencies of the position; identifying knowledge, skills, and abilities; identifying factors in ranking applicants; and determining and confirming an assessment strategy.
